scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Amanda
scrape.text: Here's what I think the author was trying to do: he was trying to illustrate how the parents of white boys who commit serious crimes can justify and enable that behaviour. What the author actually produced in trying to do that was a book that dips more than a toe in the waters of racism and ableism. Paul as the main character was insufferable and Claire had no personality at all. What a wretched book full or wretched characters.
